item.title: Community Clothing Giveaway
item.description: Please come support clothing drive on Saturday, June 19, 2021 from 9am -12pm

item.title: New Pastor Survey
item.description: Announcement From Church Staff: We are asking all members to complete a survey regarding the senior pastor vacancy. You may contact Dea. May, Sis. Latonya Freeman, or Dea. Baymon for help in getting a survey and completing it. You may also email us at ebcopendoors@gmail.com. Thanks.

item.title: Rev. Rockmore Drive Thru Celebration
item.description: DATE: May 1, 2021 TIME: 1pm to 2pm NOTE: PLEASE DO NOT EXIT YOUR VEHICLE

item.title: Upcoming Events
item.description: Church Conference Date: Thursday, April 1, 2020 Time: 6:30pm Members only Easter Program Date: Saturday, April 3, 2021 Time: 11am See Sis. Thomas for additional information ElBethel Virtual Service and Communion Date: Sunday, April 4, 2021 Time: 11am On Zoom, Facebook and Youtube. See Contact Us

item.title: Contact Us
